document.full_text: the parts shortages and resulting production shutdowns caused by the japanese earthquake and tsunami could cause the global auto industry to rethink how it sets up its supply lines, a top industry economist said on tuesday.
document.title: japan could cause auto supply chain rethink: expert
lines_and_colors: the parts shortages and resulting production shutdowns caused by the japanese earthquake and tsunami could cause the global auto industry to rethink how it sets up its supply lines, a top industry economist said on tuesday.
